IT_SET_SHISHI_05.EXPR: [Winter Holiday Special!] This set contains 10 of the two main pieces of equipment that are required at high Job Levels.

IT_SET_MADOU_05.NAME: Winter Holiday Celebration Magic Set [EX]
IT_SET_MADOU_05.EXPR: [Winter Holiday Special!] This set contains 10 of the two main pieces of equipment that are required at high Job Levels. (For Magic-related jobs.)

IT_SET_XMAS_BUKKOU_01.NAME: Winter Holiday PATK Set
IT_SET_XMAS_BUKKOU_01.EXPR: [Winter Holiday Special!] This set contains rare equipment that is required for physical attack jobs.

IT_SET_XMAS_MAKOU_01.NAME: Winter Holiday MATK Set
IT_SET_XMAS_MAKOU_01.EXPR: [Winter Holiday Special!] This set contains rare equipment that is required for magical attack jobs.

IT_SET_RINGO_XMAS.NAME: Winter Holiday Apple Set
IT_SET_RINGO_XMAS.EXPR: [Winter Holiday Special!] This set contains an assortment of Apples, which can be used to raise Unit Level. Great value for money!

IT_SET_XMAS_SOUBI_01.NAME: Winter Holiday Rare Equipment Set
IT_SET_XMAS_SOUBI_01.EXPR: [Winter Holiday Special!] This great value set contains rare equipment that is required at high Job Levels.

IT_SET_FUKUBUKURO_01.NAME: New Year's Mystery Bag Set [L]
IT_SET_FUKUBUKURO_01.EXPR: [New Year] This set contains tickets that allow you to choose each of the following: 1x Rare Summon unit or Sacred Stone unit; 1x 3★ or 4★ gear (excluding limited time/collaboration gear); 50x Soul Shards for a 4★, 4-5★, or 5★ unit, and 25x Fire/Water/Wind/Thunder/Light/Dark elemental shards. (Once purchased, the ticket will be shown in your Gifts. When you claim the gift, you will be taken to the selection screen.)

IT_SET_FUKUBUKURO_02.NAME: New Year's Mystery Bag Set [M]
IT_SET_FUKUBUKURO_02.EXPR: [New Year] This special set contains tickets for summoning: one guaranteed 5★ unit, one guaranteed 4★ piece of gear, and 25 either Fire, Water, Wind, Thunder, Light, or Dark elemental shards.

IT_SET_FUKUBUKURO_03.NAME: New Year's Mystery Bag Set [S]
IT_SET_FUKUBUKURO_03.EXPR: [New Year] This special set contains tickets for summoning: one unit that can be evolved to 5★, one piece of gear, and five either Fire, Water, Wind, Thunder, Light, or Dark elemental shards.

IT_SET_FUKUBUKURO_SOUBI_01.NAME: New Year's Equipment Mystery Bag [L]
IT_SET_FUKUBUKURO_SOUBI_01.EXPR: [New Year] This special set contains five tickets for summoning job-specific equipment of your choice (excluding equipment for collaboration/Sacred Stone units), and rare equipment.

IT_SET_FUKUBUKURO_SOUBI_02.NAME: New Year's Equipment Mystery Bag [M]
IT_SET_FUKUBUKURO_SOUBI_02.EXPR: [New Year] This great value set contains ten each of equipment required at intermediate Job Level.

IT_SET_FUKUBUKURO_SOUBI_03.NAME: New Year's Equipment Mystery Bag [S]
IT_SET_FUKUBUKURO_SOUBI_03.EXPR: [New Year] This great value set contains ten each of equipment required at starting Job Level.

IT_SET_FUKUBUKURO_BIGGINER.NAME: New Year's Beginner Mystery Bag
IT_SET_FUKUBUKURO_BIGGINER.EXPR: [New Year] Pick this up first! This excellent value set is packed with items that can be used to enhance low level units. Can be purchased using Zeni.

IT_SET_TAGATAME_STARTER_01.NAME: Alchemist Code Starter Set
IT_SET_TAGATAME_STARTER_01.EXPR: [Collaboration Celebration] This special set is very helpful when you're starting out. Contains units and evolution/enhancement items to help you on your way!

IT_SU_GL_4STAR_TICKET.NAME: 4★ Unit Selector
IT_SU_GL_4STAR_TICKET.EXPR: Use this ticket to summon the 4★ unit of your choice.

IT_US_GL_10RAREUNIT_TICKET_B01.NAME: Rare Unit 10-Summon Ticket
IT_US_GL_10RAREUNIT_TICKET_B01.EXPR: Use this ticket to summon ten 3-5★ units.

IT_US_GL_5STARUNIT_TICKET_B01.NAME: 5★ Unit Summon Ticket
IT_US_GL_5STARUNIT_TICKET_B01.EXPR: Use this ticket to summon one 5★ unit.

IT_US_4STARGEAR_TICKET_B01.NAME: 4★ Gear Summon Ticket
IT_US_4STARGEAR_TICKET_B01.EXPR: Use this ticket to summon one 4★ gear item.

IT_SET_GL_MERDA_01.NAME: Melda Equipment Set
IT_SET_GL_MERDA_01.EXPR: This set contains rare equipment required for Melda. (Jobs: Beast Tamer, Thief, and Samurai.)

IT_SET_GL_BF_BOOSTER_01.NAME: Brave Frontier Booster Set
IT_SET_GL_BF_BOOSTER_01.EXPR: [Collaboration Celebration] This great value set contains loads of items needed to enhance units.

IT_SET_GL_SELE_01.NAME: Selena Equipment Set
IT_SET_GL_SELE_01.EXPR: This set contains rare equipment required for Selena. (Jobs: Ice Swordsman, Magic Swordsman, and Ice Princess)

IT_SET_GL_VARG_01.NAME: Vargas Equipment Set
IT_SET_GL_VARG_01.EXPR: This set contains rare equipment required for Vargas. (Jobs: Soldier, Pyromancer, and Great Pyromancer)

IT_SET_GL_APPLE_BF.NAME: Metal God Apple x50
IT_SET_GL_APPLE_BF.EXPR: This set contains 50 valuable Metal God Apples, which can be used to greatly raise Unit Level.

IT_SET_GL_APPLE_BF_20.NAME: Metal God Apple x20
IT_SET_GL_APPLE_BF_20.EXPR: This set contains 20 valuable Metal God Apples, which can be used to greatly raise Unit Level.

IT_SET_GL_ARM_01.NAME: Soldier Rare Equipment Set
IT_SET_GL_ARM_01.EXPR: This set contains equipment required for the job Soldier.

IT_SET_GL_SELE_SELE1_01.NAME: Ice Swordsman Rare Equipment Set
IT_SET_GL_SELE_SELE1_01.EXPR: This set contains equipment required for the job Ice Swordsman.

IT_SET_GL_SELE_SELE2_01.NAME: Ice Princess Rare Equipment Set
IT_SET_GL_SELE_SELE2_01.EXPR: This set contains equipment required for the job Ice Princess.

IT_SET_GL_VARG_VARG1_01.NAME: Pyromancer Rare Equipment Set
IT_SET_GL_VARG_VARG1_01.EXPR: This set contains equipment required for the job Pyromancer.

IT_SET_GL_VARG_VARG2_01.NAME: Great Pyromancer Rare Equipment Set
IT_SET_GL_VARG_VARG2_01.EXPR: This set contains equipment required for the job Great Pyromancer.

IT_US_GL_RAREUNIT_TICKET_B02.NAME: Rare Unit Summon Ticket
IT_US_GL_RAREUNIT_TICKET_B02.EXPR: Use this ticket to summon one 3-5★ unit.

IT_US_GL_10RAREUNIT_TICKET_B02.NAME: Rare Unit 10-Summon Ticket
IT_US_GL_10RAREUNIT_TICKET_B02.EXPR: Use this ticket to summon ten 3-5★ units.

IT_US_GL_5STARUNIT_TICKET_B02.NAME: 5★ Unit Summon Ticket
IT_US_GL_5STARUNIT_TICKET_B02.EXPR: Use this ticket to summon one 5★ unit.

IT_US_4STARGEAR_TICKET_B02.NAME: 4★ Gear Summon Ticket
IT_US_4STARGEAR_TICKET_B02.EXPR: Use this ticket to summon a 4★ gear item.

IT_PI_SABER.NAME: Saber Soul Shard
IT_PI_SABER.EXPR: Required for Limit Breaks. If you collect enough Soul Shards, you can also transmute the corresponding unit.

IT_PI_ARCHER.NAME: Archer Soul Shard
IT_PI_ARCHER.EXPR: Required for Limit Breaks. If you collect enough Soul Shards, you can also transmute the corresponding unit.

IT_PI_FATE_ZAHAR.NAME: Archer Zahar Soul Shard
IT_PI_FATE_ZAHAR.EXPR: Required for Limit Breaks. If you collect enough Soul Shards, you can also transmute the corresponding unit.

IT_PI_TOSAKA_RINN.NAME: Rin Tohsaka Soul Shard
IT_PI_TOSAKA_RINN.EXPR: Required for Limit Breaks. If you collect enough Soul Shards, you can also transmute the corresponding unit.

IT_PI_IRIYA.NAME: Illyasviel Soul Shard
IT_PI_IRIYA.EXPR: Required for Limit Breaks. If you collect enough Soul Shards, you can also transmute the corresponding unit.

IT_PI_FATE_YOMI.NAME: Rider Yomi Soul Shard
IT_PI_FATE_YOMI.EXPR: Required for Limit Breaks. If you collect enough Soul Shards, you can also transmute the corresponding unit.

IT_PI_FATE_LAMIA.NAME: Saber Lamia Soul Shard
IT_PI_FATE_LAMIA.EXPR: Required for Limit Breaks. If you collect enough Soul Shards, you can also transmute the corresponding unit.

IT_EQ_SOUL_FATE_SABR.NAME: Saber Token
IT_EQ_SOUL_FATE_SABR.EXPR: Required in order to change to the "Saber" job type

IT_EQ_SOUL_FATE_ARCH.NAME: Archer Token
IT_EQ_SOUL_FATE_ARCH.EXPR: Required in order to change to the "Archer" job type

IT_EQ_SOUL_FATE_CAS.NAME: Caster Token
IT_EQ_SOUL_FATE_CAS.EXPR: Required in order to change to the "Caster" job type

IT_EQ_SOUL_FATE_BSKR.NAME: Berserker Token
IT_EQ_SOUL_FATE_BSKR.EXPR: Required in order to change to the "Berserker" job type

IT_EQ_SOUL_FATE_RIDR.NAME: Rider Token
IT_EQ_SOUL_FATE_RIDR.EXPR: Required in order to change to the "Rider" job type

IT_EQ_SOUL_FATE_LAN.NAME: Lancer Token
IT_EQ_SOUL_FATE_LAN.EXPR: Required in order to change to the "Lancer" job type

IT_EQ_SOUL_FATE_TMAG.NAME: Rin Tohsaka Token
IT_EQ_SOUL_FATE_TMAG.EXPR: Required in order for Rin Tohsaka to change to the "Jewel Magician" job type

IT_EQ_SOUL_FATE_IMAG.NAME: Illya Token
IT_EQ_SOUL_FATE_IMAG.EXPR: Required in order for Illya to change to the "Master Magician" job type

IT_EQ_SOUL_FATE_ASS.NAME: Assassin Token
IT_EQ_SOUL_FATE_ASS.EXPR: Required in order to change to the "Assassin" job type

IT_EQ_SOUL_FATE_GOLD.NAME: Gilgamesh Token
IT_EQ_SOUL_FATE_GOLD.EXPR: Required in order for Gilgamesh to change to the "Hero King" job type

IT_EQ_FATE_ASS.NAME: Assassin Robe
IT_EQ_FATE_ASS.EXPR: PATK +12, PDEF +8, DEX +9, AGI +6, Death Sentence Res +2
IT_EQ_FATE_ASS.FLAVOR: The clothing worn by the nameless swordsman who was illegally summoned as an Assassin. Fitting combat attire for a master warrior--not only does it help boost attack power and agility, it also boosts resistance against Death Sentence.

IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_ASS.NAME: Assassin Robe Diagram
IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_ASS.EXPR: Required in order to create: Assassin Robe

IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_ASS.NAME: Assassin Robe Diagram Piece
IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_ASS.EXPR: Collect 80 of these to create: Assassin Robe Diagram

IT_EQ_FATE_SABR.NAME: Saber Armor
IT_EQ_FATE_SABR.EXPR: PATK +30, PDEF +18, AGI +8, DEX +12, CRIT +10, Fire Res +2
IT_EQ_FATE_SABR.FLAVOR: Armor worn during combat. It is materialized from the wearer's mana, and can be equipped and unequipped at will. Because of this, it cannot be used when the wearer's mana is depleted. It strengthens the user, boosting various attributes.

IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_SABR.NAME: Saber Armor Diagram
IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_SABR.EXPR: Required in order to create: Saber Armor

IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_SABR.NAME: Saber Armor Diagram Piece
IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_SABR.EXPR: Collect 80 of these to create: Saber Armor Diagram

IT_EQ_FATE_ARCH.NAME: Archer Black Bow
IT_EQ_FATE_ARCH.EXPR: PATK +16, DEX +8, AGI +8, CRIT +5, Light Res +2
IT_EQ_FATE_ARCH.FLAVOR: The black bow materialized by Zahar when transmuted as an Archer. It's very easy to use--so much so that Zahar could not believe it was the first time he had used it. It enhances the bearer's abilities as an Archer, boosting attack power and agility.

IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_ARCH.NAME: Archer Black Bow Diagram
IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_ARCH.EXPR: Required in order to create: Archer Black Bow

IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_ARCH.NAME: Archer Black Bow Diagram Piece
IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_ARCH.EXPR: Collect 80 of these to create: Archer Black Bow Diagram

IT_EQ_FATE_EMIYA_A.NAME: Archer Coat
IT_EQ_FATE_EMIYA_A.EXPR: PATK +24, DEX +6, CRIT +4, Fire Res +2, Water Res +2
IT_EQ_FATE_EMIYA_A.FLAVOR: Worn during combat, this coat offers protection against attacks from the outer world. Thought to have been made from the shroud of a holy man, when worn it is said to boost not only defensive ability but also a range of other attributes.

IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_EMIYA_A.NAME: Archer Coat Diagram
IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_EMIYA_A.EXPR: Required in order to create: Archer Coat

IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_EMIYA_A.NAME: Archer Coat Diagram Piece
IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_EMIYA_A.EXPR: Collect 80 of these to create: Archer Coat Diagram

IT_EQ_FATE_EMIYA_B.NAME: Archer Vest
IT_EQ_FATE_EMIYA_B.EXPR: HP +5, PATK +18, PDEF +2, MDEF +2, Thunder Res +2
IT_EQ_FATE_EMIYA_B.FLAVOR: This vest is made to be worn underneath an Archer Coat. It is designed to fit tightly around the muscles, ensuring maximum comfort even during intense movement. Simply donning it is said to boost the wearer's physical abilities.

IT_EQ_PIECE_FATE_EMIYA_B.NAME: Archer Vest Piece
IT_EQ_PIECE_FATE_EMIYA_B.EXPR: Collect 10 of these to create: Archer Vest

IT_EQ_FATE_EMIYA_C.NAME: Archer Legwear
IT_EQ_FATE_EMIYA_C.EXPR: AGI +6, DEX +5, LUCK +4, Light Res +2, Dark Res +2
IT_EQ_FATE_EMIYA_C.FLAVOR: These jet-black pants are made to be worn underneath an Archer Coat. The legs are wrapped with numerous belt-shaped ornamentations, but rather than restricting movement these are in fact said to boost agility and dexterity.

IT_EQ_PIECE_FATE_EMIYA_C.NAME: Archer Legwear Piece
IT_EQ_PIECE_FATE_EMIYA_C.EXPR: Collect 20 of these to create: Archer Legwear

IT_EQ_FATE_CAS.NAME: Caster Garment
IT_EQ_FATE_CAS.EXPR: MATK +28, MDEF +24, AGI +2, Dark Res +2, Light Res +2
IT_EQ_FATE_CAS.FLAVOR: This orthodox magician's robe has a hood that covers the head. As well as being useful for those who like to avoid being identified, what makes this robe truly invaluable are its magic power and resistance-boosting properties.

IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_CAS.NAME: Caster Garment Diagram
IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_CAS.EXPR: Required in order to create: Caster Garment

IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_CAS.NAME: Caster Garment Diagram Piece
IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_CAS.EXPR: Collect 80 of these to create: Caster Garment Diagram

IT_EQ_FATE_BSKR.NAME: Berserker Outfit
IT_EQ_FATE_BSKR.FLAVOR: This waist armor is said to have been worn by a legendary hero who defeated myriad monsters, and even gods, in combat. Made from a fabric designed for maximum ease-of-movement, and a very tough ore, it provides ample protection for the lower body. When worn it boosts not only defense but also attack power.

IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_BSKR.NAME: Berserker Outfit Diagram
IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_BSKR.EXPR: Required in order to create: Berserker Outfit

IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_BSKR.NAME: Berserker Outfit Diagram Piece
IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_BSKR.EXPR: Collect 80 of these to create: Berserker Outfit Diagram

IT_EQ_FATE_RIDR.NAME: Rider Outfit
IT_EQ_FATE_RIDR.EXPR: HP +15, PATK +9, DEX +7, AGI +6, Blind Res +2
IT_EQ_FATE_RIDR.FLAVOR: These clothes are made from a flexible material that doesn't obstruct movement, making them ideal for agile and acrobatic hand-to-hand combat styles. When worn they allow the wearer to move more nimbly, and also boost resistance against blinding attacks.

IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_RIDR.NAME: Rider Outfit Diagram
IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_RIDR.EXPR: Required in order to create: Rider Outfit

IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_RIDR.NAME: Rider Outfit Diagram Piece
IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_RIDR.EXPR: Collect 80 of these to create: Rider Outfit Diagram

IT_EQ_FATE_LAN.NAME: Lancer Outfit
IT_EQ_FATE_LAN.FLAVOR: This blue combat gear is designed to stand up to the rapid and intense movements performed when using a lance in combat. It forms a one-piece suit, and is fitted with guards to protect the neck and shoulders. When worn it is said to shape itself to fit the wearer's body, boosting a range of different attributes.

IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_LAN.NAME: Lancer Outfit Diagram
IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_LAN.EXPR: Required in order to create: Lancer Outfit

IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_LAN.NAME: Lancer Outfit Diagram Piece
IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_LAN.EXPR: Collect 80 of these to create: Lancer Outfit Diagram

IT_EQ_FATE_TMAG.NAME: Rin's Outfit
IT_EQ_FATE_TMAG.EXPR: HP +16, PATK +5, PDEF +16, MATK +18, AGI +2, Water Res +2
IT_EQ_FATE_TMAG.FLAVOR: The color red is symbolic of Rin Tohsaka, and her clothes are naturally also this color. The chest area is adorned with a white, cross-like motif. They're cute, provide good ease-of-movement, and are said to boost attack power and agility.

IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_TMAG.NAME: Rin's Outfit Diagram
IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_TMAG.EXPR: Required in order to create: Rin's Outfit

IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_TMAG.NAME: Rin's Outfit Diagram Piece
IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_TMAG.EXPR: Collect 80 of these to create: Rin's Outfit Diagram

IT_EQ_FATE_IMAG.NAME: Illya's Outfit
IT_EQ_FATE_IMAG.EXPR: HP +7, MATK +25, MDEF +20, AGI +2, Fire Res +2, Thunder Res +2
IT_EQ_FATE_IMAG.FLAVOR: With her beautiful silver hair and youthful appearance, and because she lives in the snowy mountains of Einzbern, Illya is known as the "snow fairy." This purple coat accentuates her pale, snow-like appearance. As well as, of course, offering protection against the cold, it also possesses magic circuit-boosting properties.

IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_IMAG.NAME: Illya's Outfit Diagram
IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_IMAG.EXPR: Required in order to create: Illya's Outfit

IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_IMAG.NAME: Illya's Outfit Diagram Piece
IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_IMAG.EXPR: Collect 80 of these to create: Illya's Outfit Diagram

IT_AF_ARMS_EXCALIBUR.NAME: Excalibur Shard
IT_AF_ARMS_EXCALIBUR.EXPR: Collect 50 of these to create: Excalibur

IT_AF_ACCS_TOSAKA_PENDANT.NAME: Tohsaka's Pendant Shard
IT_AF_ACCS_TOSAKA_PENDANT.EXPR: Collect 50 of these to create: Tohsaka's Pendant

IT_AF_ACCS_IRIYA_BIRD.NAME: Storch Ritter Shard
IT_AF_ACCS_IRIYA_BIRD.EXPR: Collect 50 of these to create: Storch Ritter

IT_AF_ACCS_GILG_SWORD.NAME: Gate of Babylon Shard
IT_AF_ACCS_GILG_SWORD.EXPR: Collect 50 of these to create: Gate of Babylon

IT_AF_ARMS_KANSYOUBAKUYA.NAME: Kanshou and Bakuya Swords Shard
IT_AF_ARMS_KANSYOUBAKUYA.EXPR: Collect 150 of these to create: Kanshou and Bakuya Swords

IT_PI_GILGAMESH.NAME: Gilgamesh Soul Shard
IT_PI_GILGAMESH.EXPR: Required for Limit Breaks. If you collect enough Soul Shards, you can also transmute the corresponding unit.

IT_EQ_FATE_GOLD.NAME: Gilgamesh's Outfit
IT_EQ_FATE_GOLD.EXPR: PATK +10, DEX +8, AGI +6, LUCK +10, Jewels Obtained +6
IT_EQ_FATE_GOLD.FLAVOR: The black-and-white jacket worn by the Hero King himself. It's simple in design, but is made of a luxurious and valuable material fitting of the Hero King. When worn it is said to boost the amount of Jewels obtained by the wearer.

IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_GOLD.NAME: Gilgamesh's Outfit Diagram
IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_GOLD.EXPR: Required in order to create: Gilgamesh's Outfit

IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_GOLD.NAME: Gilgamesh's Outfit Diagram Piece
IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_GOLD.EXPR: Collect 80 of these to create: Gilgamesh's Outfit Diagram

IT_US_FATE_TAIYAKI.NAME: Taiyaki
IT_US_FATE_TAIYAKI.EXPR: Casts Quicken status on user for three turns.
IT_US_FATE_TAIYAKI.FLAVOR: A fish-shaped bean jam-filled snack sold at the "Edomae-ya" food stall found in the shopping district. Despite its low price, it's packed with bean jam right to the end of the tail, making it extremely popular among students. The pastry is soft and fluffy, and it's apparently still pretty tasty even when it's cooled down.

IT_US_FATE_SANDWICH.NAME: Rin's Sandwich
IT_US_FATE_SANDWICH.EXPR: Removes all statuses except Death Sentence and slightly recovers HP.
IT_US_FATE_SANDWICH.FLAVOR: A special sandwich made by Rin Tohsaka. She gets up early in the morning to make them, and they're certainly very special, with a delicious flavor that'll satisfy even the most discerning of gourmands.

IT_EV_ARCH01.NAME: Cleaning Tool
IT_EV_ARCH01.EXPR: Can be used to evolve Archer
IT_EV_ARCH01.FLAVOR: The tool used by Archer when he was given his first order by Rin Tohsaka after summoning him: to clean up her room. Archer did so reluctantly, but the next day the room was apparently astonishingly tidy...

IT_EV_ARCH02.NAME: Tea Set
IT_EV_ARCH02.EXPR: Can be used to evolve Archer
IT_EV_ARCH02.FLAVOR: The tea set used by Archer to prepare tea for Rin Tohsaka. Even Rin, his master, will admit how delicious the tea he makes is. Why Archer is so good at making tea is a total mystery, though...

IT_UG_APPLE_FATE.NAME: Mana Apple
IT_UG_APPLE_FATE.EXPR: An apple that raises a unit's Exp (extra-large amount).
IT_UG_APPLE_FATE.FLAVOR: This apple is said to be imbued with magical energy. This energy is passed onto the user, and lives on forever inside him or her. The apple has the power to improve the owner's fate, and is extremely rare and valuable.

IT_UG_APPLE_PUNK.NAME: Dulyn Apple
IT_UG_APPLE_PUNK.EXPR: An apple that raises a unit's Exp (extra-large amount).
IT_UG_APPLE_PUNK.FLAVOR: This apple is said to be imbued with memories of Dulyn's research. These memories are inherited by the user, and live on forever inside him or her. It looks like an apple fairy, but saying this out loud will cause it to become angry and indignant.

IT_UG_APPLE_SHINOBI.NAME: Trick Apple
IT_UG_APPLE_SHINOBI.EXPR: An apple that raises a unit's Exp (extra-large amount).
IT_UG_APPLE_SHINOBI.FLAVOR: This apple is said to be imbued with memories of the Land of Shinobi. These memories are inherited by the user, and live on forever inside him or her. It's mechanized, and can move autonomously--caution is advised, as if left unattended it may wander off by itself.

IT_UG_APPLE_ACORN.NAME: Acorny Apple
IT_UG_APPLE_ACORN.EXPR: An apple that raises a unit's Exp (extra-large amount).
IT_UG_APPLE_ACORN.FLAVOR: This apple is said to be imbued with the memories of adventurers who attempted to conquer the Yggdrasil Labyrinth. These memories are inherited by the user, and live on forever inside him or her. It contains the knowledge and wisdom required to complete the maze, and is extremely valuable.

IT_UG_APPLE_80CP.NAME: [800K Celebration] Cryptic Apple
IT_UG_APPLE_80CP.EXPR: An apple that raises a unit's EXP (super-large amount).
IT_UG_APPLE_80CP.FLAVOR: This apple is said to be imbued with the memories of adventurers from around the world. These memories are inherited by the user, and live on forever inside him or her. Carried by a young girl, it possesses the power to see the future and is extremely rare.

IT_UG_APPLE_90CP.EXPR: An apple that raises a unit's EXP (super-large amount).
IT_UG_APPLE_90CP.FLAVOR: This apple is said to be imbued with the memories of adventurers from around the world. These memories are inherited by the user, and live on forever inside him or her. Carried by a young girl, it possesses the power to see the future and is extremely rare.

IT_UG_APPLE_100CP.NAME: [1M Celebration] Cryptic Apple
IT_UG_APPLE_100CP.EXPR: An apple that raises a unit's EXP (super-large amount).
IT_UG_APPLE_100CP.FLAVOR: This apple is said to be imbued with the memories of adventurers from around the world. These memories are inherited by the user, and live on forever inside him or her. Carried by a young girl, it possesses the power to see the future and is extremely rare.

IT_UG_APPLE_110CP.EXPR: An apple that raises a unit's EXP (super-large amount).
IT_UG_APPLE_110CP.FLAVOR: This apple is said to be imbued with the memories of adventurers from around the world. These memories are inherited by the user, and live on forever inside him or her. Carried by a young girl, it possesses the power to see the future and is extremely rare.

IT_UG_APPLE_120CP.EXPR: An apple that raises a unit's EXP (super-large amount).

IT_UG_APPLE999.NAME: Awesome Apples
IT_UG_APPLE999.EXPR: An apple that raises a unit's Exp (extra-large amount).
IT_UG_APPLE999.FLAVOR: This apple is said to be imbued with the memories of adventurers from around the world. These memories are inherited by the user, and live on forever inside him or her. Rainbow-colored apples such as this are said to contain multiple eras' worth of memories, and are seldom seen at all.

IT_EQ_BASI_CLOAK.NAME: Informer Cape
IT_EQ_BASI_CLOAK.EXPR: [Basheeny/Mobile Knight-Only Equipment] PATK +18, DEX +12, AGI +10, CRIT +18, Dark Res +2, Jewels +4
IT_EQ_BASI_CLOAK.FLAVOR: This cloak was given to Basheeny by a certain person when he was given his first assignment as an apprentice knight. As well as its defensive capabilities, it also increases agility and dexterity, and boosts various resistances, making it invaluable when working covertly.

IT_EQ_HWIZ_KABUTO.NAME: Extravagant Helmet
IT_EQ_HWIZ_KABUTO.EXPR: Max HP +30, PDEF +20, MATK +16, MDEF +6, Max Jewels +10
IT_EQ_HWIZ_KABUTO.FLAVOR: This helmet is a required piece of ceremonial wear. It is designed for Battle Mages, who possess high concentrations of Alchemia and magical energy inside them. It raises the wearer's maximum Jewels, allowing them to most effectively use their powers at important ceremonies.

IT_EQ_LUCA_TWIN_SWORD.NAME: Alchemic Kukri
IT_EQ_LUCA_TWIN_SWORD.EXPR: [Lucian/Holy Brawler+-Only Equipment] HP +30, PATK +36, MATK +16, DEX +12, CRIT +16
IT_EQ_LUCA_TWIN_SWORD.FLAVOR: This kukri knife is engraved with a pattern that allows Alchemia particles to flow easily along its blade, efficiently combining the bearer's power with that of the Alchemia. Lucian himself had it made to order to his own weight and length specifications, and it's a beautiful piece.

IT_EQ_LUCA_HOOD.NAME: Soldier's Shemagh
IT_EQ_LUCA_HOOD.EXPR: [Lucian/Holy Brawler+-Only Equipment] HP +30, PDEF +10, DEX +20, LCK +12, Charm Res +2
IT_EQ_LUCA_HOOD.FLAVOR: This shemagh scarf is worn over the head or around the neck in order to guard against desert heat and sandstorms. Its modest design and inconspicuous coloring mean it doesn't get in the way during combat. The coins hanging from it are actually made from fabric, and are completely silent.

IT_EQ_LUCA_SCARF.NAME: Desolate Muffler
IT_EQ_LUCA_SCARF.EXPR: [Lucian/Holy Brawler+-Only Equipment] HP +36, MDEF +12, AGI +3, CRIT +16, Stun Res +2
IT_EQ_LUCA_SCARF.FLAVOR: Because Lucian is such an individualist, he deliberately chose this distinctive, purple-colored scarf so that he'd stand out. He probably should have gone for a less conspicuous color, like his shemagh, but he does find that being clad in this noble purple helps him steel himself.

IT_EQ_LUCA_CLOTH.NAME: Riot Gear
IT_EQ_LUCA_CLOTH.EXPR: [Lucian/Holy Brawler+-Only Equipment] HP +36, CRIT +12, DEX +16, Fire Res +3, Water Res +1
IT_EQ_LUCA_CLOTH.FLAVOR: Lucian's combat gear, which also serves as his workwear. At first glance it looks no more remarkable than the other garish garms worn by many desert people, but it is in fact designed to provide optimal ease-of-movement during combat, as well as protection against both heat and cold. The waistband has been designed to match his purple scarf.

IT_EQ_LUCA_PANTS.NAME: Crest Charm
IT_EQ_LUCA_PANTS.EXPR: [Lucian/Holy Brawler+-Only Equipment] PATK +20, PDEF +8, AGI +3, Wind Res +1, Jewels Obtained +1
IT_EQ_LUCA_PANTS.FLAVOR: Lucian wears this lucky necklace at all times. He had it made when he decided to become a mercenary, and it is crafted in the same shape as the Alchemia markings on his back. For Lucian, as a mercenary, it's like an identification tag.

IT_EQ_LUCA_SWORDS.NAME: Elphinda Guards
IT_EQ_LUCA_SWORDS.EXPR: [Lucian/Holy Brawler+-Only Equipment] Stun Res +2, Paralyze Res +2, Sleep Res +2, Petrify Res +2, Poison Res +2
IT_EQ_LUCA_SWORDS.FLAVOR: Lucian freely wields these throwing daggers using the powers of Alchemia. Apparently he has a pretty large stock of them, but no one other than him knows exactly how many. They're also effectively defensively if thrown when attacked from a blind spot.

IT_SET_GL_EASTER_SET_01.NAME: [Spring Festival] Grow Set
IT_SET_GL_EASTER_SET_01.EXPR: [Spring Festival] This great value set contains items that can be used to boost unit level and equipment, and Skip Tickets. Also contains Gold Ingots.

IT_SET_GL_EASTER_SET_02.NAME: [Spring Festival] Booster Set
IT_SET_GL_EASTER_SET_02.EXPR: [Spring Festival] This great value set contains loads of items needed to enhance units. Also contains one Elemental Soul Shard 5-Summon Ticket that can summon five Soul Shards (either Fire, Water, Wind, Thunder, Light, Dark, or Rainbow element).

IT_SET_GL_EASTER_SOUBI_01.NAME: [Spring Festival] Equipment Set
IT_SET_GL_EASTER_SOUBI_01.EXPR: [Spring Festival] This great value set contains ten each of equipment required at intermediate job level.

IT_SET_GL_EASTER_SOUBI_02.NAME: [Spring Festival] Equipment Starter Set
IT_SET_GL_EASTER_SOUBI_02.EXPR: [Spring Festival] This great value set contains ten each of equipment required at starting job level.

IT_SET_GL_EASTER_BIGGINER.NAME: [Spring Festival] Beginner Set
IT_SET_GL_EASTER_BIGGINER.EXPR: [Spring Festival] Pick this up first! This excellent value set is packed with items that can be used to enhance low level units. Can be purchased using Zeni.

IT_SET_GL_TICKET_EASTER.NAME: Skip Ticket x100
IT_SET_GL_TICKET_EASTER.EXPR: [Spring Festival] This set contains lots of tickets that can be used to skip Story Quest battles. Special discount!

IT_SET_GL_RINGO_EASTER.NAME: [Spring Festival] Apple Set
IT_SET_GL_RINGO_EASTER.EXPR: [Spring Festival] This set contains an assortment of Apples, which can be used to raise unit level. Special discount!

IT_SET_GL_APPLE4_EASTER.NAME: Forbidden Apple x20
IT_SET_GL_APPLE4_EASTER.EXPR: [Spring Festival] Special limited-time offer. Contains 20 very rare Forbidden Apples. Can be purchased using Zeni.

IT_SET_GL_SHISHI_EASTER.NAME: [Spring Festival] Lion Set [EX]
IT_SET_GL_SHISHI_EASTER.EXPR: [Spring Festival] This set contains 10 of the two main pieces of equipment that are required at high job levels.

IT_SET_GL_MADOU_EASTER.NAME: [Spring Festival] Mage Set [EX]
IT_SET_GL_MADOU_EASTER.EXPR: [Spring Festival] This set contains 10 of the two main pieces of equipment that are required at high job levels. (For magic-related jobs.)

IT_SET_GL_EASTER_BUKKOU_01.NAME: [Spring Festival] PATK Set
IT_SET_GL_EASTER_BUKKOU_01.EXPR: [Spring Festival] This set contains rare equipment that is required for physical attack jobs.

IT_SET_GL_EASTER_MAKOU_01.NAME: [Spring Festival] MATK Set
IT_SET_GL_EASTER_MAKOU_01.EXPR: [Spring Festival] This set contains rare equipment that is required for magical attack jobs.

IT_SET_GL_CM_R_EASTER.NAME: [Spring Festival] Advanced Equipment Set
IT_SET_GL_CM_R_EASTER.EXPR: [Spring Festival] This great value set contains required equipment for jobs from Lv. 7 and up.

IT_SET_GL_CM_H_EASTER.NAME: [Spring Festival] Required Equipment Set
IT_SET_GL_CM_H_EASTER.EXPR: [Spring Festival] This great value set contains required equipment for jobs from Lv. 10 and up.

IT_UG_APRIL_COIN.NAME: Gem of Experience
IT_UG_APRIL_COIN.EXPR: A cube that raises a unit's EXP (huge amount).
IT_UG_APRIL_COIN.FLAVOR: Often mistaken for its more well-known cousin, this crystal cube is imbued with the memories of Alchemists that can be used to grant experience to its user.

IT_US_APRIL_TEARS.NAME: Vial of Tears
IT_US_APRIL_TEARS.EXPR: Medicine that recovers a unit's HP (large amount).
IT_US_APRIL_TEARS.FLAVOR: A phial of miracle dew that is said to be a drink of the gods that can instantly heal any wound. The liquid is also noted to have a salty aftertaste.

IT_US_APRIL_SALT.NAME: Salt Salve
IT_US_APRIL_SALT.FLAVOR: Salt is a natural remedy for many ailments. In this world, salt is a prized commodity that is created every time the Door of Truth is opened.

IT_AF_ACCS_EGG_2017.NAME: Mystical Egg Shard
IT_AF_ACCS_EGG_2017.EXPR: Collect 777 of these to create: Mystical Egg

IT_AF_ACCS_SHOT_PENDANT.NAME: Anti-Missile Pendant Shard
IT_AF_ACCS_SHOT_PENDANT.EXPR: Collect 777 of these to create: Anti-Missile Pendant

IT_SET_ASUW_01.NAME: Aswald Equipment Set
IT_SET_ASUW_01.EXPR: This set contains rare equipment required for Aswald. (Jobs: Shadow Assassin, Twin-Blade Swordsman, and Gunner.)

IT_SET_KYAR_01.NAME: Carol Equipment Set
IT_SET_KYAR_01.EXPR: This set contains rare equipment required for Carol. (Jobs: Machinist, Hunter, and Merchant.)

IT_SET_KIL_01.NAME: Shadow Assassin Rare Equipment Set
IT_SET_KIL_01.EXPR: This set contains equipment required for the job Shadow Assassin.
